Articles.Content:
Hello!

I bought KSP on new years and just joined the forums. I will most likely be posting for help, and showcasing my craft. Anyone who responds to this topic deserves a welcoming wave.

beacause why not.

Welcome to the forum @splatn't™. 

We are happy to help with any problems you might encounter. When I showcase my craft I post them on Kerbalx - a website specifically built for KSP creations with lots of features that assist in uploading, categorising and hosting all your kerbal kontraptions. You can also get inspired by the great work of other members.

2 hours ago, James Kerman said:

Welcome to the forum @splatn't™. 

We are happy to help with any problems you might encounter. When I showcase my craft I post them on Kerbalx - a website specifically built for KSP creations with lots of features that assist in uploading, categorising and hosting all your kerbal kontraptions. You can also get inspired by the great work of other members.

Thank you for informing me of KerbalX. I will check it out.
hello fella, right now you are talking to the most random (maybe) personality on le forum (look i did something random without noticing it) and also, my English ain't great, welcome aboard XD ))

Welcome to the Forums @splatn't™!

First off, I love your name. That's awesome. 

Second, don't hesitate to ask questions! The people here are more than welcoming and are ready to assist you with anything you need. Hopefully you're enjoying KSP.

(I also highly recommend checking out Fan Works and the Spacecraft Exchange. These sections are chock full with inspiration, novels, and craft for you to download and explode. 

-Lach

Edited April 13, 2019 by Lo Var Lachland
Sections, not "topic." Silly me. :P
